originalText.text: My insurance would not cover my blood pressure medication after I was discharged from the hospital, after 6 days. The pharmacist did not say anything until everything else was ready and then he says to me ‚Äú your insurance wouldn‚Äôt cover your medication, be sure to call or have your doctor call the insurance or change the medication.‚Äù I asked how much would it cost if I paid cash? He says ‚Äú I gave it to you anyway .‚Äù I‚Äôm just letting you know for next time. I couldn‚Äôt believe it because this has happened before with other medications and no pharmacy ever just gave me what I needed without charge. I recommend this pharmacy to anyone because they are very respectful clean and caring. My new go to pharmacy!!! üôèüèºü•∞‚ù§Ô∏è

originalText.text: Ive been with them for years .they kind courteous .always helpful and even deliver my medication.and even spoke with my doctor on a refill.i love this place.:) Truly nice people

originalText.text:
I like this Pharmacy for several reasons.

It's been my preferred pharmacy for approximately four yrs.

The staff will go out out of their way to help you, i understand fully well that customer service is part of the job, however, they will go above and beyond what is considered normal.

Muhammad and Ahmed will take the time to make sure your medicine is right, they ask about your well-being and really mean it. The rest of the staff is also amazing.

I have never had an issue with my prescriptions. The only thing is that sometimes you may have to wait a day if the prescription is for a rare drug, and this makes perfect sense. I don't think any pharmacy stocks every single drug.

I can't say it enough, I love this pharmacy.

Try using their services yourself.

originalText.text: Best pharmacy in NY! Great service, pharmacist is very nice, and the technicians are always happy to help!

text.text: Best pharmacy in NY! Great service, pharmacist is very nice, and the technicians are always happy to help!

originalText.text: Rite hope pharmacy is a very small neighborhood pharmacy that does most of there sales in prescription medications. The store front window is a hot mess the are barely any items in there window display and what there is is a joke because they look dust and old just like the other saleable items in there store. There are only one or two items on there selves. Its a dismal display of items for sale. Not to mention the store is so small you can help but feel like everyone in the store are standing on top of each other. It a dump amd the staff treats there customers like they are doing you a favor by waiting on you. There anything but friendly. Instead they watch you like a hawk as if you might steal something. I've been in this store twice and belive me I'll never enter this store again. I'd rather walk 5 blocks out of my way then to patronize this store again. Plus the prices are more expensive then in other pharmacys in this area. I rated them a 2 but when i thing of it they shouldn't of even gotten that.
